column1: Cosamaloapan is a municipality  located in the plains of the Sotavento zone in the central zone of the State of Veracruz
column2: about 240 km from state capital Xalapa. It has a surface of 323.26 km2. It is located at 18°22′N 95°48′W.

column1: The poet Manuel Carpio was born in Cosamaloapan. Cosamaloapan serves as the municipal seat of the municipality of Cosamaloapan de Carpio
column2: which was so renamed in honour of its most famous son in 1918.

column1: The municipality of Cosamaloapan is delimited to the north by Tierra Blanca and Ixmatlahuacan to the south by Chacaltianguis and Tuxtilla to the east by Carlos A. Carrillo and to the west by Tres Valles.  It is watered by small creeks of the river Papaloapan.

column2: in May takes place the celebration in honor of the Virgen de la Concepción
column4: and in December takes place the celebration in honor of the Virgen de Guadalupe.

column1: The weather in Cosamaloapan is warm  and wet all year with rains in summer and autumn.
